U_infinity.description: Free-stream velocity, in meters per second.

delta.description: Suction side displacement thickness, in meters.

SSPL.description: Scaled sound pressure level, in decibels.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in acoustics and aerodynamics.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the frequency, angle of attack, chord length, free-stream velocity, and thickness of the airfoil, please predict the scaled sound pressure level.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted scaled sound pressure level is.
